SEARCH
Package com.example.fusion1_events

Class EventsModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.fusion1_events.EventsModel
public class EventsModel extends Object
Model class representing an event with its details and participant lists. Stores event information including title, dates, attendees, waiting list, and image URL.

  • Constructor Details

    • EventsModel

      public EventsModel(String eventTitle, ArrayList<String> selectedTags, Date registrationStart, Date registrationEnd, String eventDescription, Date date, Long attendees, Long signups, ArrayList<String> waitingList, String imageUrl, String eventId, ArrayList<String> invitedList, Long maxWaitList, ArrayList<String> cancelled, ArrayList<String> confirmed, boolean geolocationRequired, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference organizerId)
      Constructor to create an EventsModel with all fields.
      Parameters:
      eventTitle - The title of the event
      registrationStart - The date when registration opens
      registrationEnd - The date when registration closes
      eventDescription - A description of the event
      date - The date when the event takes place
      attendees - The maximum number of attendees allowed
      signups - The current number of signups
      waitingList - List of entrant IDs on the waiting list
      imageUrl - The Cloudinary URL for the event image
      eventId - The Firestore document ID
      invitedList - List of entrant IDs selected for the event
      maxWaitList - The maximum number of entrants on the waiting list
      cancelled - List of entrant IDs who were cancelled
      confirmed - List of entrant IDs who are in the final confirmed list
      geolocationRequired - boolean indicating if users locations will be on or off
      organizerId - the reference of the organizer who owns the event

  • Method Details

    • getCancelled

      public ArrayList<String> getCancelled()
      Returns the list of cancelled entrant IDs. If the list is null, it initializes an empty list to avoid null references.
      Returns:
      A non-null list of cancelled entrant IDs.

    • setCancelled

      public void setCancelled(ArrayList<String> cancelled)
      Sets the list of cancelled entrants for the event. If the provided list is null, an empty list is assigned instead.
      Parameters:
      cancelled - The list of cancelled entrant IDs, or null to reset to an empty list.

    • getConfirmed

      public ArrayList<String> getConfirmed()
      Returns the list of confirmed entrant IDs. Ensures the list is never null by creating an empty list when necessary.
      Returns:
      A non-null list of confirmed entrant IDs.

    • setConfirmed

      public void setConfirmed(ArrayList<String> confirmed)
      Sets the list of confirmed entrants for the event. If null is passed, the method initializes an empty list instead.
      Parameters:
      confirmed - The list of confirmed entrant IDs, or null to reset to an empty list.

    • addToWaitingList

      public void addToWaitingList(String entrantId)
      Adds an entrant to the waiting list if they are not already present. Prevents duplicate entries in the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant to add

    • removeFromWaitingList

      public void removeFromWaitingList(String entrantId)
      Removes an entrant from the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant to remove

    • isInWaitingList

      public boolean isInWaitingList(String entrantId)
      Checks if an entrant is in the waiting list.
      Parameters:
      entrantId - The ID of the entrant to check
      Returns:
      true if the entrant is in the waiting list, false otherwise

      public boolean isGeolocationRequired()
      Returns whether geolocation is required for this event.
      Returns:
      true if geolocation is required, false otherwise

    • setGeolocationRequired

      public void setGeolocationRequired(boolean geolocationRequired)
      Sets whether geolocation is required for this event.
      Parameters:
      geolocationRequired - true to require location verification, false otherwise
